message.content: {"id": "19089", "title": "No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)", "description": "When opening a java editor in Photon, there is no popup menu when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler. This menu is expected to provide options to add breakpoints/marks, etc. The menu does not appear as it should.", "OB": "1) Open a java editor. 2) Right click on the left vertical ruler. This should popup a menu to add breakpoints/marks, etc, but it does not.", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
